titleStmt.title: A letter from a scholar in Oxford to his friend in the country shewing what progresse the visitors have made in the reformation of that university, and what it is that obstructs it.
titleStmt.author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard Braithwaite in the Wrenn catalogue--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
